summary: Test suite for the Kustomize integration in the security scanning tool, covering the core runner behavior, image reference handling, version parsing utilities, and supporting helper functions. The tests verify binary output retrieval, overlay path recording, enforcement rule filtering, image metadata extraction, caching, license checks, and proper parsing of Kubernetes tool versions.
business_intent: Ensure that the Kustomize scanning component functions correctly and reliably, providing accurate detection of configuration issues, proper image analysis, and adherence to enforcement policies within the security scanning platform.
